title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
short_cast: Akshay Kumar, Bhumi Pednekar, Divyendu Sharma, Atul Srivastava, Anupam Kher, Ayesha Raza Mishra, Mukesh Bhatt, Shubha Khote, Sudhir Pandey

desc: On her first day of marriage, a woman leaves her husband upon learning his home lacks a toilet, sparking a quixotic quest to acquire modern sanitation.
